title: PBKDF2
extract: PBKDF2 (Password-Based Key Derivation Function) is a key stretching algorithm. It can be used to hash passwords in a computationally intensive manner, so that dictionary and brute-force attacks are less effective.
extract_html: PBKDF2 (Password-Based Key Derivation Function) is a key stretching algorithm. It can be used to hash passwords in a computationally intensive manner, so that dictionary and brute-force attacks are less effective.
